snippet: The California labor commissioner ruled this week that a program at the Bank of America Corporation for its employees to ''adopt'' and care for automated teller machines was illegal.    Bank of America publicized the program this week. The bank sa...
lead_paragraph: The California labor commissioner ruled this week that a program at the Bank of America Corporation for its employees to ''adopt'' and care for automated teller machines was illegal. Bank of America publicized the program this week. The bank said it was a voluntary program under which it encouraged bank employees to each find one cash machine to care for.
abstract: Marcy Saunders, California's labor commissioner, rules that program at Bank of America Corp for employees to 'adopt' and care for automated teller machines is illegal; bank publicized plan as voluntary program (S)

headline.main: A.T.M. Cleanup Plan Ruled Out of Order
